user_query: My company is organizing a charity event and we want it to be fun and visually appealing. Can you suggest some random named colors and provide us with funny baby pig pictures for promotional materials? Additionally, we need to gather some post comments from 9GAG API to engage with our audience on social media.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of random named colors for the event.
Retrieve funny baby pig pictures for the promotional materials.
Gather post comments from the 9GAG API to engage with the audience on social media.
